page.title: 08The River Ouse at Clapham
page.content: The River Ouse is a nice river. The river ends at The Wash. It is very old. You can tell this by all the bends in it. There's another River Ouse in York. The River Ouse at Clapham passes through lots of counties. These are some of them _ Beds., Oxfordshire, Bucks., Cambridgeshire and Norfolk. The Vikings used to sail along the river Ouse. People used the church to see if the Vikings were coming. The Vikings got out of their boats at the ford. A ford is a place where the water is not very deep and farmers used to take the cattle across it. A few people go fishing because there are lots of fish in the river. I know who goes swimming in the river. I like the River Ouse because it is not noisy.
